website_summaries.verdict: Created as a nod to Tretorn’s athletic heritage, these retro-inspired sneakers with a twist upgrade one’s casual look with its premium design and plush comfort. The Rawlins 3 hits all the right style marks with a laid-back yet sporty statement. In spite of some tweaks to the pair, this defines an everyday street sneaker that has a double duty to keep one comfortable while looking good and feeling fresh with a classic look and vibrant colors.
pros: The retro look of the Tretorn Rawlins 3 has been well-loved by a lot of customers
According to several reviewers, these are some super cute pairs that look great with any outfit
This sneaker by Tretorn has a perfectly comfortable fit, as what numerous impressed users have experienced
These kicks are beyond comfortable and stylish
Plenty have observed that these low-top sneakers are so light
A certain owner has noticed that the slightly elevated sole gives her a smidge more height
Some have mentioned that these shoes are pretty comfortable even without socks
The retro look makes the pair way cooler
cons: One user has mentioned that the shoes don’t have enough arch support
The toe area was quite tight, a few wearers have commented
A couple of testers have remarked that these Tretorns do not breathe well

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I love these! I have wide- post -pregnancy -weight -gain -feet and these are very comfy. They appear very narrow but they do not fit narrowly. These would not be good for running I don’t think (at least not if you are overweight). I love the retro look of this shoe too! I will bit again, I do believe!
customer_reviews.author: Yasmeen Husain

customer_reviews.title: Best sneaker I've tried
customer_reviews.text: This old school beauty slipped on my foot like I was Cinderella. Perfect comfortable fit. Streamlined toe and slightly elevated sole makes my foot look lean. I love this Tretorn White w/ red and light blue accents...super cool and eye-catching. With the color being mainly white, the subtle colors pop just enough to say a little something.... I am a new fan of this classic
customer_reviews.author: Amazonwoman

customer_reviews.title: love the design, but fit too shallow
customer_reviews.text: these are good shoes, and retro (so am I) and they fit a tad too shallow for my wide toe box retail tortured foot. But they make up for that in design. I do like them, just wouldn't go running in them.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie Mack

customer_reviews.title: Super cute sneakers!
customer_reviews.text: I love the old school look of these sneakers. They felt really snug at first, but quickly molded to my foot. They are very comfortable. I'm no shoe expert, but I don't think that this sneaker is good for wide feet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great until it got wet
customer_reviews.text: They were great the first time I wore them; they were cute and comfortable. When the shoes got wet, they turned a yellow color and the shoe seemed like it would disintegrate, changing shape.
customer_reviews.author: Grayson Ramsey

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy vintage looking tennis shoe.
customer_reviews.text: I ABSOLUTELY LOVE these shoes! They look adorable on and are very comfortable. If your looking for that vintage tennis shoe look, you have found it! I get so many compliments on these!
customer_reviews.author: J.L.

customer_reviews.title: I felt the retro love. Friends of the 1990's noticed these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I felt the retro love. Friends of the 1990's noticed these shoes. Anyone born past 1999 didn't know the impact of this brand. Most Tretorns are too large, but this fit my foot. I usually take a "B" 9, but a regular 9 fit. It doesn't breath that well, so you'll have some warm hooves.
customer_reviews.author: P. Sampson

customer_reviews.title: nice touch.
customer_reviews.text: 7.5 was $15.49, size 7 was $75; so I went with the 7.5.. it's a little big, but the shoe is very cute so I am going to keep. (it is a pointy tennis shoe so it is long) Came with 2 sets of shoe laces, nice touch.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Epping

customer_reviews.title: Right toe box but cute shoe
customer_reviews.text: The toe area was quite tight for a tretorn. Wish it had been wider super cute shoe
customer_reviews.author: Pmac

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great looking shoe. Had to return due to buying too small. Regular size wasn’t available.
customer_reviews.author: Bargenhuntress

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very cute and comfortable sneaker. They are somewhat narrow and I had to order a half size up.
customer_reviews.author: Nimue

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Runs big. Usually I wear US 7 but this pair is like 7.5 or 8. If you have skinny feet, buy half side down.
customer_reviews.author: Vera4ever

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love these soooo much! They're very soft and comfortable. And they're true to size.
customer_reviews.author: NB

customer_reviews.title: Not comfortable at all
customer_reviews.text: These shoes run small and are very stiff. Not comfortable at all.
customer_reviews.author: emily nance

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: So pretty in pink, fits well and snug, so comfy no breaking in needed.
customer_reviews.author: Jade Therese
